page.title: 14EMPLOYMENT STRACATHRO
page.content: Apart from the square on our grid containing Stracathro Hospital, the {population of our area under study is {approx 115.}Of these{no more than 10 {actually work the land.}A few are employed by the hospital and others live here but work elsewhere. To our knowledge,{there is no one {classed as un-employed in the area. The main employers in the area besides the estates and the hospital, are{a small engineering business}in the village of Inchbare,{the Forestry {Commission, a sand and gravel quarry,a {sawmill, a paper-store and an E.E.C. {Grain Intervention Store. Most of the people employed by these concerns live outwith the area of our study.
